# J-Type and JALR Instructions Test
# JAL x1, 8 (Jump and Link)
00000000100000000000000011101111
# NOP (skipped)
00000000000000000000000000010011
# ADDI x5, x0, 99 (skipped)
00000110001100000000001010010011
# ADDI x6, x0, 100 (executes after JAL)
00000110010000000000001100010011
# ADDI x2, x0, 16 (set x2 = 16 for JALR target)
00000001000000000000000100010011
# JALR x3, 4(x2) (Jump to address in x2+4, save return in x3)
00000000010000010000000111100111
